trends: There have been 35 other sightings in Grants Pass
There were no other sightings in Grants Pass on or around December 17th 2007
divs: Sighting Detailsi was putting my dog in his kennel as i noticed a chevron shaped object just over the hillside on my property. At firt i thought it was a plane until i looked more closely. you cluld see the outline of the object as it swayed back and forth. It was much longer than a plane and it moved from side to side. After about 35 minutes of watching it move several hundred yards side to side it dipped behind the hillside. This object was under 2 miles away from me so if it was a plane or a helicopter i would have definatley heard it.
Summary: chevron shaped object hovered slowly back and forth over my property for over a half an hour
